executionArgs.additionalInstruction: Testa il sistema Sofia AI completo: endpoint WhatsApp (/webhook/whatsapp), endpoint Voice (/webhook/voice), riconoscimento intent multilingue, flusso conversazionale completo, integrazione Twilio, persistenza Firebase, sistema multi-agent (Planner, Validator, Executor, Memory), loop guard, structured logging. Focus su success rate >= 80% e fallback rate <= 10%.
